title: Microsoft Asimov's ultimate robot (MAC)
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
description: Everything you always wanted to know about robots. Explore the world of robotics as you build, animate and print your own robots using parts by the Star Wars robots designer. Explore the fascinating world of Asimov's robots and stories. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Any Macintosh computer with a Macintosh-compatible colour monitor; system 6.0.7 or later; 4 Mb of RAM; at least 2.5 Mb of available hard disk space; CD-ROM drive.
